item.title: [+] Current Members
item.description: 0xnil –> Reverse Engineering | PWN #CLOUDSEC_GANG Knows python4, certified 0xniller. 0x157 –> Forensics | Networking #FUCKEDUPSLEEPSCHEDULE “Hopefully there’s no steganography in forensics this CTF.” Little did he know all forensics challenges were steg. shelldawg –> Web Exploitation | OSINT Wannabe Ohio resident, admires the state, culture, and their Intelligence. Bluegale –> Reverse Engineering #FUCKEDUPSLEEPSCHEDULE Favourite noodles went up in price 0.89â‚¬ * 2. Asia Green Garden lower yalls prices! Also Coke > Pepsi, #GOLANG_GANG.
item.content:
0xnil –> Reverse Engineering | PWN

#CLOUDSEC_GANG

Knows python4, certified 0xniller.

0x157 –> Forensics | Networking

#FUCKEDUPSLEEPSCHEDULE

“Hopefully there’s no steganography in forensics this CTF.” Little did he know all forensics challenges were steg.

shelldawg –> Web Exploitation | OSINT

Wannabe Ohio resident, admires the state, culture, and their Intelligence.

Bluegale –> Reverse Engineering

#FUCKEDUPSLEEPSCHEDULE

Favourite noodles went up in price 0.89â‚¬ * 2. Asia Green Garden lower yalls prices! Also Coke > Pepsi, #GOLANG_GANG.

Suvoni –> Cryptography | Hardware

#CRYPTOMACHINE

Huff diz nuts

pipironi –> Binary Exploitation

“and I’m not ropping with this fucking shit.” LMAO I wish I ropped that day. I could’ve cleared all the pwn challs

warl0cker –> Web Exploitation | Forensics

If you need life advice, go to this guy. Proud quote of the day guy for the team.

B-boy Pro –> Cryptography | MISC

#CRYPTOMACHINE

“what is your idea?” | “crypto done”

Achux21 –> Web Exploitation | OSINT

Overall useless, OSINT enjoyer and fellow KOTH player.

lowlevel01 –> Binary Exploitation

dr00pyD0gg lowlevel2.0

item.content:
Our CTF team is a tight-knit group of individuals who share a common love for cybersecurity challenges. Though we come from different corners of the world, with members hailing from Morocco ðŸ‡²ðŸ‡¦, Germany ðŸ‡©ðŸ‡ª, Italy ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡¹ , USA ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸, and Romania ðŸ‡·ðŸ‡´, our shared passion unites us.

With each competition, we push ourselves to the limit, honing our skills and expanding our knowledge. Our team embodies the spirit of collaboration, constantly learning from each other and fostering an environment of growth. Whether it’s late-night brainstorming sessions or intense code-cracking moments, we stand together as a resilient CTF family, fueling our collective success and leaving our mark in the world of cybersecurity competitions.
